channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Italian Erasmus
item.description: The Italian Erasmus is a national student mobility programme based on agreements between Italian universities.%0AThe call for applications and all other information are available on the Italian Erasmus page.%0A

item.title: Office closure
item.description: The Se.Fa offices of the Faculty of Political, Economic and Social Sciences will be closed from 8 to 16 August 2024. %0A

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 24 + 25 September 2024 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 24 + 25 September 2024.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam on 25 + 26 September 2024 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam scheduled on 25 + 26 September 2024.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty of Law: offices summer closing
item.description: Se.Fa and President of the Executive Committee offices for the Faculty of Law will be closed from 12 to 23 August. Student reception will only be available remotely from 26 to 30 August, office hours 9:30-12 (Monday to Friday), 14:30-16 (Monday,Tuesday,Thursday):%0A‚Ä¢ tel. 02-50312473%0A‚Ä¢ via Teams by appointment (mail to sefa.giurisprudenza@unimi.it)%0A

item.title: Call for applications to the Virgilio Program 2024-2025
item.description: Applicants must be enrolled on track in Year III of the single-cycle Master‚Äôs degree in Medicine and Surgery for the a. y. 2024-2025. %0A‚Ä¢ Places available: 10; %0A‚Ä¢ How to apply:‚ÄØvirgilio@unimi.it; %0A‚Ä¢ Application deadline: 15 September 2024.%0A %0A%0AüìÑ Call for applications 2024-2025

item.title: Notice
item.description: From 8 am on 7 August to 8 pm on 8 August, all online services that require authentication with university credentials will be down for maintenance. %0AThis will not affect email services, the Microsoft 365 suite, servers hosting shared folders (dataserver) and Unimibox, which will all be available during the maintenance window.%0A

item.title: Offices closing Humanities
item.description: The Student Offices for the Faculty and the Management Committee Charmain's Office will be closed to the public from 12th until 23th August 2024.%0A

item.title: Call for CELI 1 i A2 and CELI 2 i cittadinanza B1 exams on 18 September 2024 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 i A2 and CELI 2 i cittadinanza B1 exams scheduled on 18 September 2024.%0AN.B.: seats for the CELI 2 i cittadinanza B1 exam are sold out.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Help us improve! Complete the survey and rate the University Library Service
Suspension of services in August 2024
item.description: Post-Graduate Guidance and Placement Services will be available until 9 August. Services will resume on 26 August.%0APhone and e-mail support services will be suspended from 12 through 23 August.%0AStudents may update their CV and apply for jobs and internships also during the suspension of services.%0A %0A

item.title: IUSS Pavia Course of Excellence A.Y. 2024/25
item.description: The call for applications for IUSS Pavia Course of Excellence A.Y. 2024/25 is published.%0AWinners will have a total tuition waiver on the second instalment and a grant of ‚Ç¨1,500. %0AMore information: IUSS Pavia Course of Excellence%0A
